agents_tab_description: Here, you can find all of your protected agents. You need to finish configuring your server to ensure it can be backed up. For more information, see the <Link>OVHcloud Backup Agent documentation</Link>
delete_agent_modal_content_main: If you have used your agent to back up data, our policy is to block your agent in a disabled status for 14 days, until the immutability period is over. You will be able to add it back again at the end of the 14 days.
delete_agent_modal_content_confirm: Do you really want to delete your agent {{agentName}}?
